title: Gsoc Snippet 06 06 2014
content:
--- title: "[GSoC Snippet] 06/06/2014" kind: article created_at: 2014-06-06 21:30:00 UTC author: Maciej (Developer Website) image: https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/2752578?s=50 categories: GSoC-2014 tags: "news developers-page ruby jekyll" layout: post ---[code] fix pull request after review from planet.rb creators (pull request has been merged)
[code] added fancybox for opening images in the same window (preparing before dynamically loaded news on front page (instead of showing few words from post, user after click on preview button will see fully rendered news without redirecting to another page))
[code] css fixes
Originally posted on pino IT / ruby / developer
